smoking: Are there any people holding a cigaret and smoking?
ped_on_lawn: Are there pedestrians on the grass lawn?
crowd: Are there many people gathering together?
tent: Are there are people setting up tents
fire: Are there on fire or any indicates such as flames, smoke, or charred objects?
trash: Are there trash or rubbish on the ground?
fallen_leaves: Are there any fallen leaves on the ground
illegal_parking: Are there any cars/vehicles parking in a no-parking zone?
